New Records: Rohit Sharma surpassed Martin Guptill as the highest scorer in all T20Is with 3307 runs.
Yuzvendra Chahal surpassed Jasprit Bumrah as India's top wicket-taker in T20Is with 67 wickets.
Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan and Rohit Sharma formed an opening stand of 111 runs.
Ishan Kishan scored a 56-ball 89 and Shreyas Iyer scored an unbeaten 57.
Indian bowlers, led by Bhuveshwar Kumar and Venkatesh Iyer, limited Sri Lanka to 137/6.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory extended India's winning streak to 10 T20 games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was India's longest winning streak in T20Is.
